This is how it works.

A very easy and hassle free setup to get you started in minutes, not hours.

DOWNLOAD

Paddle will transfer the files to the email account that you have used to order. Then download it from your email.

UNPACK

The sections are compressed to .zip format. Unpack them and open it with your code editor.

CODE

Follow up the instructions given by Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap 5 for a better development experience.
